name: CandyMan (xXSuperMan00Xx)
description:
This game is in Beta.

Use WASD to control your character.

The game is best played in full screen.

Use your mouse to click on appliances.

Instructions:

1.Start at the storage container. Far right of the map.

2.Click either Chocolate Powder or Lollipop Powder (depending on the customers order)

3.Put that in the oven. Then put the next item in the Mold. Then put that item in the Freezer.

4. Finally, click on the plate to deliver the order.

5.If you mess up click the garbage can to restart

Still need help?

Check my Instagram where I go through a demo of the game:

@dev.chrisr
